Footnotes
1 Offcolored beans due to environmental factors shall not
be considered other varieties. Other distinguishable varieties shall be
considered to include offtype seeds that can be differentiated from the variety
that is being analyzed. 2 Total weed seed shall not exceed 10 per pound. 3 Objectionable weeds shall include all New York State
noxious weed seeds and giant foxtail (
Sateria faberii
), weeds
considered as objectionable are quackgrass (
Agrophron repens
), charlock (
wild mustard

arvense

(

(

carolinense

(

), Russian knapweed (
Centaurea
repens

Galium spp. ), and leafy spurge
(

). Notes
